extendedInfo.description: The most efficient input method. Support any language.eType let you use real keyboard to type to phone. eType work with WIFI.Share the computer keyboard to your phone with wifi.Use the real keyboard typing on the phone.How to use?Open Settings Â» Language & keyboard Â» Select eType.Long press on any text box Â» Click Input Method Â» Select eType.Don't forget the "http://"Enableï¼first time you need enable eType in Setting. Tap to open the top right menu , open Setting , select eType in Keyboard settings, confirm to enable eType.Openï¼you can simply change your input method by doing a long press on any text input bar and select eType as your default.Useï¼open your computerâs browser and type in the URL provided at the bottom of keyboard. Donât forget the âhttp://â. Some browser can not find the page without the âhttp://â like IE.You can simply test it by typing and watch your text appear on your device. reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Even willing to shell out for a pay version that gets rid of the ads. It works better than WiFi Keyboard on Windows 7 in that what you type in the browser screen is visible. Would like a nicer interface buttons though, something more like DoMobile\'s other keyboard app, ShareKeyboard. The addition of a \"Send\" button on eType, however, is genius!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: sucks
reviews.comment: installed and does not work at all. removed and re-installed. doesn\'t work. app immediately crashes when selecting a text box. this is on a Note 2 in case anyone else is thinking of installing on that.
reviews.author: D. Shayne Christie

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: This is exactly what I have been looking for. No need to tinker with bluetooth keyboards, etc. The developer should consider putting a feature to pay for this app to stop receiving the advertisement. I am willing to pay to stop the ad! Edit 12/2012: This app crashes after, say, 1 week of usage or so. Small bug, but I hope developer will look into this. Updated to 4 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good work
reviews.comment: good work. it also works via lan using android usb tether.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has worked great in the past, but\342\200\246
reviews.comment: After a recent OS upgrade, eType started to immediately crash. The fix was simple, uninstall and reinstall and functionality most returned. I was unable to get the return key to break a line, a new unexpected behavior, but otherwise was able to update text via eType.
